name: Google BigQuery
description: Import BigQuery scheduled queries, stored procedures, materialized views, transfer jobs, tables, and routines. Comprehensive orchestration for BigQuery workloads.
author: Dagster Community

outputs.description: Generates assets for each BigQuery entity

import_scheduled_queries.label: Import Scheduled Queries
import_scheduled_queries.description: Import scheduled queries as materializable assets

import_stored_procedures.label: Import Stored Procedures
import_stored_procedures.description: Import stored procedures as materializable assets

import_materialized_views.label: Import Materialized Views
import_materialized_views.description: Import materialized views as materializable assets

import_transfer_jobs.label: Import Transfer Jobs
import_transfer_jobs.description: Import Data Transfer Service jobs as materializable assets

import_tables.label: Import Tables
import_tables.description: Import tables as observable assets (limited to 50 per dataset)

filter_by_labels.label: Filter by Labels
filter_by_labels.description: Comma-separated label keys to filter entities

generate_sensor.label: Generate Observation Sensor
generate_sensor.description: Create sensor to observe scheduled query runs

group_name.label: Asset Group
group_name.description: Group name for all imported assets
